I slept on that mattress for three months because I was too stubborn to admit I'd messed up."}]]}]]}]}]}],["$","div","1",{"data-slot":"card","className":"bg-card text-card-foreground flex flex-col gap-6 rounded-xl border py-6 shadow-sm border-red-200 dark:border-red-900/30","children":["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-content","className":"px-6 pt-6","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"flex items-start gap-3","children":[["$","$L28",null,{"size":"md","className":"text-red-500 flex-shrink-0 mt-1"}],["$","div",null,{"children":[["$","h3",null,{"className":"font-semibold text-lg mb-2","children":"The Blue Dollar Confusion"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-muted-foreground","children":"Used my US credit card for everything the first month. My Argentine friends still laugh at me."}]]}]]}]}]}],["$","div","2",{"data-slot":"card","className":"bg-card text-card-foreground flex flex-col gap-6 rounded-xl border py-6 shadow-sm border-red-200 dark:border-red-900/30","children":["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-content","className":"px-6 pt-6","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"flex items-start gap-3","children":[["$","$L28",null,{"size":"md","className":"text-red-500 flex-shrink-0 mt-1"}],["$","div",null,{"children":[["$","h3",null,{"className":"font-semibold text-lg mb-2","children":"The Siesta Schedule"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-muted-foreground","children":"Tried to open a bank account at 2 PM on a Tuesday. 1c:["$","section",null,{"className":"py-16","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"container mx-auto px-4","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"max-w-3xl mx-auto","children":[["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-3xl font-bold mb-6","children":"How This Site Makes Money (Full Transparency)"}],["$","div",null,{"className":"prose prose-lg max-w-none text-muted-foreground","children":[["$","p",null,{"className":"mb-4","children":"Let's talk about money because I hate when sites pretend they're doing this out of pure altruism. I'm not. This site helps pay my rent in pesos, and I'm going to be straight with you about how."}],["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-semibold text-foreground mt-6 mb-3","children":"Sponsorship"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"mb-4","children":["This site is sponsored by ",["$","strong",null,{"children":"Lucero Legal"}],", a Buenos Aires law firm that specializes in helping expats with visas and residency. They approached me in mid-2023 after I'd already written most of the visa guides. I chose to work with them because:"]}],["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc pl-6 mb-4 space-y-2","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":"They actually know what they're talking about (I've verified this the hard way)"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"They don't try to upsell people on services they don't need"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"They answer my questions when I'm updating content, so the info stays accurate"}]]}],["$","p",null,{"className":"mb-4","children":"Does this affect my recommendations? Lucero knows this and is cool with it."}],["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-semibold text-foreground mt-6 mb-3","children":"Affiliate Links"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"mb-4","children":"Some pages have affiliate links (like to Wise for money transfers). If you sign up through those links, I get a small commission. It doesn't cost you anything extra. I only recommend services I actually use—my Wise account has saved me hundreds of dollars in bank fees."}],["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-semibold text-foreground mt-6 mb-3","children":"What I Don't Do"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"mb-4","children":"I don't take money to write positive reviews of apartments, cafés, or services. I don't sell your email address. I don't publish sponsored content disguised as advice. If I'm recommending something, it's because I genuinely think it's helpful."}]]}]]}]}]}]

I tried to explain in my broken Spanish. He listened, nodded, and then refused to let me pay for my coffee. \"Para que te sientas mejor,\" he said. They'll give you a free coffee because you look like you need it. They'll help you figure out the bus system even when you can barely explain where you're going. They'll adopt you into their city with a warmth I didn't know existed."}],["$","p",null,{"children":"That's why I'm still here. That's why I built this site. Because this city is worth the hassle, and I want to help you get past the hard parts to the good stuff."}]]}]]}]}]}]
